title: The Silent Force
overview: Ward Fuller—Former Navy intelligence agent. Tough, dedicated and daring. Amelia Cole—Whip-smart and fast moving. She has the memory of an elephant and the cunning of a tigress. Jason Hart—Sophisticated, self-educated, cool. An attorney who studied his way up from the ghetto. They are the Silent Force, hand-picked for their dangerous battle against ruthless, deadly big-time crime.
